name: The Illness Called Love 1.0 Demo
description:
-THIS GAME IS A DEMO NOT THE FULL VERSION-

Early Access Version has been uploaded here! (and the files are NOT too big this time!): https://csr.itch.io/ticl-ea

Keep up with the progress here: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=...

The actual download can be found here (the file is too big for this site): http://gamejolt.com/games/the-illness-called-love-...

Suki is a high school girl who lives the life of a normal introvert, doesn't talk much and doesn't have much friends at her new school. It turns out one of her classmates is a childhood friend that seems overly eager to reunite with her. Around this time, there seems to be someone that lurks closely behind Suki wherever she goes. In attempts to avoid her stalker, she runs into a delinquent that seems two have two sides of her besides her rough exterior.

{NOTES: I wrote, drew, edited, and coded everything with the help of Ren'Py. The music in the demo is by Emilie Autumn which I have permission from the artist's manager to use this song, as long as it's not for profit. But, I will be having original music that I put together in the final version of 1.0.}

[This is essentially a yandere yuri. It will also be a sample to an even bigger game with more characters.]

WARNING: foul language, violence, and explicit themes and topics.
